body_html:
I just pushed some code to start/stop the GPUTracer in the right places - haven't tested in anger.

To produce a decent visualization the GPUTracer::Collect method will need changing to be able to pass in a worker-specific device prefix. Since it's used elsewhere this will probably require a bunch of other code to be fixed up and tested.

Other than that, it should be mostly there.

body:
I just pushed some code to start/stop the GPUTracer in the right places - haven't tested in anger.

To produce a decent visualization the GPUTracer::Collect method will need changing to be able to pass in a worker-specific device prefix.  Since it's used elsewhere this will probably require a bunch of other code to be fixed up and tested. 

Other than that, it should be mostly there.
